page.title: 17RECREATION C. CROOKHAM
page.content: One of the playground games we play is a game called{"It around the wall" Someone's It and they've got to chase the rest of the people round a wall in the playground.The dust bin is home.Once you've tounched someone they can't touch you back. The person who's it counts to a hundred.Everyone else hides when she has finished. She looks for the people who are hiding and tries not to let any body touch the post and say 1_2_3 out! If you spot someone you both try and get home firstand say 123 out.Who ever spotted you can save people by touching the post shouting 1_2_3 in, save all! Many skipping and singing games are played.A clapping game is the Duke's Daughter, played in twos.A favourite game is"{Last one in the {Semi"}= Crossing over safely.
